TopicTitle: How to move RCS foward and backwards?

Articles.Content:
Im trying to dock in space and I got REALLY close. But I just needed to move another foot foward but I couldnt figure out how? 

 rcs

[NOSE] [HULL] [ROCKET] Thats how my rocket is and I want to move it this way: < and > way. How do I do this? Thank you!

 rcs

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-08T19:15:04Z" title="06/08/2015 07:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 8, 2015</time> by Gonzxor**
Lol I sound like such an idiot, but I couldnt find it out! Thanks!
